transArray.content: The location of the hotel is easy to find, and the disinfection measures during the epidemic were also very good. As soon as you enter the door, you will be disinfected and checked for temperature. The ladies at the front desk are very professional and enthusiastic. There are also robots that deliver meals, so you can get your meals without leaving your room. The room was also very clean and the stay was very comfortable. I was very satisfied with my stay and will come back often if I have the opportunity!

Dear guest, thank you for staying at Beijing Chaoyang Park Qiaodong Branch and giving us a favorable review. The hotel belongs to the Hanting 2.7 version. The products are very new and clean. It is also very close to Chaoyang Joy City. You can shop and eat there, which is very convenient. Also There is a free parking lot and laundry room. I hope this hotel will become your first choice in Beijing. We sincerely look forward to your visit again!
